definition: to doubt (sth)/to be skeptical of/to have one's doubts/to harbor suspicions/to suspect that
to call into question/to question (truth or validity)
hard to understand/difficult to deal with/knotty/complicated

sentences.english: He had scarcely handed me the letter when he asked me to read it.
sentences.chinese: 他一把疑交给我便叫我念给他听。

sentences.english: For example: The worried well are using up all the flu vaccines.
sentences.chinese: 那些“疑病症”患者都把流感疫苗给用完了。

sentences.english: If you sketch weird or ugly faces, you are probably mistrustful.
sentences.chinese: 而奇怪的丑陋的脸庞则说明你内心很多疑。

sentences.english: That's why I do not have food with hot sauce or chili.
sentences.chinese: 英国男子吃自制咖喱酱后离奇死亡疑被辣椒辣死。

sentences.english: Current ways of categorizing somatoform disorders are problematic.
sentences.chinese: 目前身体形式疑病症的分类方法也有问题。

sentences.english: The contribution distributor thinks the microcomputer pollution is absolutely beyond argue.
sentences.chinese: 捐款分配者认为微机污染是绝对不容寘疑的。

sentences.english: Ownership in indivision is ended by a partition of the property.
sentences.chinese: 未分财产的所有权经财产分割即告疑终结。

sentences.english: Just as anxiety can be treated with medication, hypochondriasis can, too.
sentences.chinese: 正如焦虑可以用药物治疗一样，疑病症也能。

sentences.english: But being a hypochondriac can be crippling.
sentences.chinese: 但得了疑病症确实可以瘫痪一个人的身心。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effect of clozapine and a antidepressant in the treatment of hypochondriacal neurosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价氯氮平联用抗抑郁剂治疗疑病症的疗效。

sentences.english: Here's a letter for you Dr white.
sentences.chinese: 怀特医熟那女无你的一封疑。

sentences.english: About 8500 pounds of ground beef were being recalled because of concerns about E. coli.
sentences.chinese: 大约8500磅碎牛肉疑感染大肠杆菌被召回。

sentences.english: I never could tell a lie that anybody would doubt, nor a truth that anybody would believe.
sentences.chinese: 我从不说众人皆疑的谎言，也从不讲大家都信的真理。

sentences.english: The effect of clozapine and a antidepressant in the treatment of hypochondriacal neurosis.
sentences.chinese: 氯氮平联用抗抑郁剂治疗疑病症的近期疗效观察。

definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
to doubt (sth)/to be skeptical of/to have one's doubts/to harbor suspicions/to suspect that
to wish for/to desire/variant of 慾|欲[yu4]
short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident
to worry/to concern oneself with/worried/anxiety/sorrow/(literary) to observe mourning

to draw (e.g. a bow)/to pull/to stretch sth/to extend/to lengthen/to involve or implicate in/to attract/to lead/to guide/to leave/to provide evidence or justification for/old unit of distance equal to 10 丈[zhang4], one-thirtieth of a km or 33.33 meters
